nodes.text: The following events took place in 21 BBY.
This year was known as Year 14 after the Great ReSynchronization, Year 979 after the Ruusan Reformation and Year 3,632 after the signing of the Treaty of Coruscant.

In Republic 61 and Star Wars: Republic: Trackdown, former Supreme Chancellor Finis Valorum was depicted as being assassinated by Anzati assassin Sajé Tasha aboard the Botajef Shipyards AA-9 freighter Star of Iskin, events taking place in 21 BBY. However, Valorum was later shown to be alive in "The Lost One," an episode in the sixth season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, which takes place in 20 BBY.
